insert into five_ed_task (business_key, step_id, project_id, project_no, project_name, stage_name, step_name, contract_no, dept_id, dept_name, major_name, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, is_process_end, remark, dept_charge_men, dept_charge_men_name ) values (#{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stepId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stepName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processEnd,jdbcType=BIT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptChargeMen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptChargeMenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.select: select id, business_key, step_id, project_id, project_no, project_name, stage_name, step_name, contract_no, dept_id, dept_name, major_name, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, is_process_end, remark, dept_charge_men, dept_charge_men_name from five_ed_task where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, business_key, step_id, project_id, project_no, project_name, stage_name, step_name, contract_no, dept_id, dept_name, major_name, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, is_process_end, remark, dept_charge_men, dept_charge_men_name from five_ed_task
